head.title: Woman Is Robbed And Hit With Brick

hedline.hl1: Woman Is Robbed And Hit With Brick

abstract.p: Woman is robbed and struck with brick by man in Flushing, Queens; woman, whose name is not released, is taken to New York Hospital Medical Center of Queens where condition is listed as stable (S)

block.p: A woman was robbed and struck with a brick yesterday morning as she walked along a Queens street, a police official said.
The woman, 36, was walking on 41st Road at Frame Place in Flushing when she was approached by a man in his 20's at 10:30 a.m., said Detective Robert Samuel, a Police Department spokesman.
A woman was robbed and struck with a brick yesterday morning as she walked along a Queens street, a police official said.
The woman, 36, was walking on 41st Road at Frame Place in Flushing when she was approached by a man in his 20's at 10:30 a.m., said Detective Robert Samuel, a Police Department spokesman.
The man robbed her and struck her on the head with the brick, breaking her jaw.
The woman, whose name was not released by the police, was taken to New York Hospital Medical Center of Queens, where her condition was listed as stable, Detective Samuel said.
In November, in an attack widely publicized for its brutality, a man attacked a young woman, Nicole Barrett, with a six-pound paving stone.
She is undergoing a lengthy recovery.
